articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign State Leaders
						
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to heads of state of different countries in reply to their messages of greeting on the occasion of the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They are President of Myanmar Thein Sein, Syrian President Bashar Al Assad and Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. 
					
					 In the messages Kim Jong Un expressed deep thanks to them for their warm greetings on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il). 
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and those countries would grow stronger, he wished the presidents successes in their work for progress and prosperity of their countries.

articles.title: DPRK Weight-Lifters Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Weight-Lifters Back Home 
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK weight-lifters came back home on Sunday after taking part in the 2014 Asian Junior and Juvenile Weightlifting Championship held in Thailand. 
					 They bagged 9 gold medals, 10 silver medals and 7 bronze medals in the championship.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Awarded Top Prize in Int'l Flower Exhibition
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Awarded Top Prize in Int'l Flower Exhibition
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia, a flower praising the great man, was awarded the first prize, the top prize of the Mongolian international flower exhibition.
					 The exhibition was held in Ulan Bator, Mongolia on Mar. 6 and 7. Displayed there were rare flowers from the DPRK, China, Mongolia and other countries.
					
					 At least 300 potted flowers were on display at the DPRK wing. Displayed there were photos introducing diplomas and medals awarded to Kimjongilia at world flower expos and exhibitions.
					
					 Visitors admired beauty, rarity and fascination of Kimjongilia.
					
					 They said that seeing Kimjongilia they came to know better about the profound reverence of not only the Korean people but the world progressives for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The friendly relations between Mongolia and the DPRK would grow stronger together with Kimjongilia named after the great man, they noted.
					
					 Kimjongilia was awarded the first prize at the prize-giving ceremony held on Mar. 7.

articles.title: U.S. Should Roll Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Roll Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The hostile policy toward the DPRK persistently pursued by the U.S. for more than half a century is now reaching an extreme phase.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is the harshest one aimed at undermining the ideology of the DPRK and bringing down its social system by dint of the U.S.-style "democracy" and market economy and swallowing up all Koreans and the whole of Korea by force of arms for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. is the chieftain of provocation and aggression. It, at the same time, styles itself an apostle of peace though it is an ill-famed mastermind of war and destruction.
					
					 It is desperately working hard to bring down the Korean-style socialism which has emerged victorious at any cost, regarding it as a thorn in the flesh.
					
					 The acute situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula in which a war may break out anytime. This is entirely attributable to the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK to stifle it by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists try to bring down the socialist system of the DPRK and occupy the whole of Korea. This is a pipedream.
					
					 With no nuclear weapons can the U.S. warmongers arrest the just cause of the Korean people and break their will.
					
					 Today the DPRK has a weapon more powerful than A-bombs no country can have.
					
					 It is just the single-minded unity in which the leader, the party and masses are closely rallied as one.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to behave itself, bearing this in mind.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Danger of U.S.-Japan Nexus for Modernization of Military Hardware
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Danger of U.S.-Japan Nexus for Modernization of Military Hardware
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. ambassador to Japan and the Japanese foreign minister recently announced that the two countries will jointly develop a littoral combat ship. Meanwhile, the U.S. Defense Department and the Japanese Defense Ministry said that the research on the joint development of the ship is pursuant to the U.S.-Japan "Defence Cooperation Guidelines". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Their decision is a reckless act of fanning Japan's moves for militarism and its preparation of reinvasion, and the part of the U.S. scheme to militarily dominate the Asia-Pacific region by using Japan as its stooge. 
					
					 The commentary refers to the vicious intention of the U.S. instigating Japan's moves for militarism and Japan talking about joint development of the littoral combat ship with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. tries to jointly develop the ship, vociferating about the U.S.-Japan "Defence Cooperation Guidelines". This is aimed to use Japan rushing headlong into militarism, obsessed with hysteria for reinvasion, as a shock brigade in realizing the U.S. strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The situation in the Asia-Pacific region has recently become acute. The Japanese reactionaries are going to develop the ship, seize the initiative in the waters off Diaoyu islands claimed by China and Japan and thus hold a military edge in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are working to achieve their ambition for overseas expansion with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 The situation in the Asia-Pacific region is uncontrollably worsening owing to the moves of the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries. 
					
					 They would be well advised to behave themselves, bearing deep in mind that their moves for the modernization of military hardware are a reckless act of fanning up arms race in the region and driving the regional situation into tensions.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. found fault with the DPRK over its just rocket launching , terming it a "grave provocation" and "violation of resolutions of the UN Security Council", prompted by its bad habit of taking issue with others at all times. It is making much ado as if there happened a great trouble due to the DPRK.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says in this regards:
					
					 It is a deliberate provocation to adjust the situation on the Korean peninsula to serve its strategic purpose.
					
					 The U.S. calculates that military supremacy is the key to carrying out its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region and, to this end, the situation on the Korean peninsula should never be allowed to be stable.
					
					 That is why it openly staged nuclear bomb-dropping drill targeting the DPRK by letting B-52 fly in the sky above Jik islet in the West Sea of Korea on the day when a contact for the reunion of separated families and their relatives from the north and the south was underway. No exception is Foal Eagle joint military drill kicked up by the U.S. in the wake of Key Resolve joint military exercise.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is freezing again due to the wicked intention of the U.S. to deliberately aggravating the situation and push ahead with its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region by such a way of irritating the DPRK and making it take self-defensive countermeasures.
					
					 This is the basic reason why an abnormal situation, neither war nor peace, persists on the Korean peninsula with the vicious cycles of tensions and detente arising in succession.
					
					 The U.S. act of throwing a wet blanket over the efforts and enthusiasm of the whole Korean nation to take the road of national reconciliation, unity and reunification in keeping with the desire of mankind for peace is a villain act of sprinkling ashes on a wedding table of others.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Promoting Organic Farming Method
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Promoting Organic Farming Method
						
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday editorially calls for positively introducing the organic farming method and other advanced farming methods and technologies to radically increase agricultural production. 
					 To positively promote the organic farming method at present is the requirement for development of agriculture in the DPRK and the trend of the developing agriculture of the world, the editorial says, referring to the tasks for promoting the organic farming method.
					
					 It says:
					
					 What is important in the organic farming method is to produce and use lots of organic fertilizers. 
					
					 It is necessary to direct efforts to the production of organic fertilizers and increase the amount of fertilizer applied per hectare. 
					
					 It is important to establish the ring-shaped rotation production system, widely use biological agrochemicals and introduce the organic farming method by mud snail. 
					
					 The agricultural field should positively introduce good cultivation methods and technologies including cultivation of tall rice seedlings, potato and grain double-cropping method, cultivation of green manure crops to make further achievements in introducing the organic farming method. 
					
					 It should generalize successes and experience gained in introducing the organic farming method to raise a strong wind of introducing the farming method.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms Remarks of Anti-DPRK Confrontationist Heinous Provocation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms Remarks of Anti-DPRK Confrontationist Heinous Provocation
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Yu Song Ok, director of the " Institute for Security Strategy" under the Intelligence Service of south Korea, in a meeting of lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" held on Tuesday malignantly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK with unspeakable invectives such as "ferocious nature" and "terror-ridden politics". Yu also let loose a string of mud-slinging at the social system of the DPRK, talking about the "possible contingency." 
					 Minju Joson Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Yu's remarks are a grave mud-slinging and heinous provocation against the DPRK as they are based on sheer, groundless lies and fabrications.
					
					 The invectives unprecedented in their contents and wicked nature are lashing all service personnel and people of the DPRK into an extreme fury as they regard the dignity of its supreme leadership as their life and soul.
					
					 Such vicious confrontationist who is treated as vice-minister by the puppet authorities made anti-DPRK confrontational remarks according to the already prepared scenario at a formal meeting of "lawmakers" from the "Saenuri Party". This is a grave incident laying bare the real attitude of Chongwadae toward fellow countrymen.
					
					 It also clearly shows that the mud-slinging at fellow countrymen getting more undisguised in south Korea is not attributable to the "freedom of expression" of individuals, organizations and the media but it is a product of the conspiracies of the conservative group including Chongwadae, the Intelligence Service and the "Saenuri Party".
					
					 In fact, the puppet conservative group's sinister provocation is laying a big hurdle in the way of improving the north-south relations drawing great attention at home and abroad, and the expectation and hope of the compatriots met frustration and disappointment.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have a real intent to build confidence between the north and the south and improve the relations between them, they should unconditionally make an apology for their grave mud-slinging at fellow countrymen and provide a guarantee for preventing the recurrence of a similar provocation. And they should properly teach such wicked confrontationists as Yu Song Ok who are standing against improved north-south relations, freely wagging their tongues.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Boosting DPRK-Russia Friendly Relations
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Boosting DPRK-Russia Friendly Relations
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- March 17 is the 65th anniversary of the conclusion of the economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in an article says on this occasion:
					
					 To develop the DPRK-Russia friendly relations accords with the aspiration and desire of the two peoples as they are neighboring countries bordered with each other.
					
					 Since the conclusion of the agreement the two governments have promoted the wellbeing of the two peoples, strengthening friendship and cooperation in the economic and cultural fields.
					
					 The agreement serves as a foundation for developing the bilateral friendly relations in the new century, too.
					
					 The bilateral friendly and cooperative relations are developing favorably day by day under the deep care of the two governments.
					
					 The Korean people are rejoiced over as their own the achievements made by the Russian people in the efforts to build a powerful state.
					
					 The Korean people wish the Russian people greater fruition in their efforts to achieve the development and stability of the country.
					
					 To further consolidate the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries fully accords with the interests of the two peoples and will make positive contributions to global peace and stability.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will grow stronger thanks to the common efforts of the two governments and peoples.

articles.title: Halt to Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a press conference in Kyonggi Province on Mar. 13 demanding a halt to the Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression.
					 It recalled that Aegis guided missile destroyer Curtis Wilbur and an Aegis destroyer entered into Phyongthaek Port to take part in the Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 It said that the joint military exercises are being staged with Aegis warships entered into Phyongthaek Port as core and the drill is applying "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the north for the first time. It went on:
					
					 The U.S. destroyers' military exercises in the West Sea of Korea and the south Korean army's participation in them are an act of offering the Korean peninsula to the U.S. as its battlefields for aggression.
					
					 The decision to "welcome" the U.S. marines involved in the Foal Eagle joint military exercises is a treacherous act of providing money collected from the people as tax to the U.S. forces.
					
					 The organization demanded a halt to the Foal Eagle joint military exercises threatening peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Actions for Winning Democratization Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Democracy Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Youth Joint Conference for Protecting Democracy of south Korea released a statement on March 14 calling for turning out in actions for democracy, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The joint conference consists of the Youth Federation, Christian Youth Council, Chondoist Youth Council and other organizations.
					
					 March 15 is the day when democracy was violated in this land due to the election rigging by the Syngman Rhee regime, the statement said. Such election rigging repeats itself in south Korea even though more than half a century has passed since then, it deplored.
					
					 Accusing the present "regime" of turning down the demands of the people for probing the truth behind the election rigging and punishing its prime movers, it condemned the Intelligence Service (IS) for having faked up even a spy case in the wake of fabrication of attempted rebellion case of the Unified Progressive Party, not content with its election rigging.
					
					 It urged the chief executive to dismiss Nam Jae Jun, director of the IS, at once as he trampled down democracy through politically-motivated operations and fabrications.
					
					 It called on young people to turn out in actions by inheriting the spirit of the April 19 Popular Uprising against injustice of the dictatorial regime.

articles.title: Japanese Government Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The 2014 national consultative meetings of the Fact-Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans took place in east and west Japan. 
					 The east Japan consultative meeting was held in the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on March 8. Present there were representatives from Tokyo, Kanagawa, Nishi-Tokyo, Saitama, Ibaragi, Gunma and Tochigi. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of strengthening the activities to solve the issue of remains of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 Terumi Terao, co-representative of the Japanese side of the fact-finding group, said that the Japanese government has not admitted the coercive nature of the crimes related to "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army, adding Japan should properly approach its past history. 
					
					 Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and representative of the Korean side of the fact-finding group, said that the Japanese government should settle the inglorious past in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration as early as possible.
					
					 The Japanese government should stop unreasonable national discrimination and violation of human rights against Koreans in Japan, he added. 
					
					 The consultative meeting heard the reports of activities of the fact-finding groups in different parts in 2013. 
					
					 Then Akihiro Harada, co-representative of the Japanese side of the fact-finding group, said that it is important to widely inform the younger generations of Japan of historical facts as regards the ever-more undisguised behavior embellishing the past in Japan. 
					
					 The west Japan consultative meeting took place in Amakasaki City, Hyogo Prefecture on February 1.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Switzerland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Switzerland
						
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Basel on March 8.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce works of the President and his exploits through internet and hold diverse events including film show and seminar in the period between March 15 and April 20.
					
					 A statement was released at the inaugural ceremony, which said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung brought the country's liberation to the Korean people, built a prosperous independent and sovereign state and led the Fatherland Liberation War to a victory.
					
					 He wisely steered socialist construction, turned the DPRK into a paradise for the people and performed undying exploits for the country's reunification and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Day of the Sun is a common holiday of progressives.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed by the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia on March 11.
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the friendship association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee fixed the celebration period from March 11 to April 18 and decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including lecture and seminar praising the revolutionary exploits of the President.
